Tivakka：A village，administered by the brahmins of the same name．Here halted the procession bearing the Sacred Bodhi-tree from Jambukola to Anurādhapura．



The brahmin，Tivakka，probably the head of the village，was present at the ceremony of the planting of the Bodhi-tree and later，one of the eight saplings from the tree was planted in the village．（Mhv．xix．37，54，61； Mbv．p．162； Sp．i．100）．
